Posts.EditableText:
Hi guys, I changed some things to the interface like the "Type here" message but when I publish it, it doesn't appear.

Any thoughts?
Posts.HTML:
Hi guys, I changed some things to the interface like the "Type here" message but when I publish it, it doesn't appear.

Any thoughts?

Posts.EditableText:
It would be easier to know if you could give some specifics about how you did it.

I do know that I have had some interesting problems with publishing - e.g. if you have libraries and you change the library code, even though it runs fine, it doesn't end up in the published file unless you force Quest to reload it all, for example by closing and reopening the project.
Posts.HTML:
It would be easier to know if you could give some specifics about how you did it.

I do know that I have had some interesting problems with publishing - e.g. if you have libraries and you change the library code, even though it runs fine, it doesn't end up in the published file unless you force Quest to reload it all, for example by closing and reopening the project.

Posts.EditableText: Thank you! Yes, I reopened it and the problem was fixed!
Posts.HTML: Thank you! Yes, I reopened it and the problem was fixed!
